all_findings.title: Potentially Uninitialized Storage Pointer
all_findings.description: Line 4: Storage pointer may be uninitialized. Ensure it's properly initialized before use.

evidence.line: /// @notice Read and write to persistent storage at a fraction of the cost.

all_findings.title: Sandwich attack vulnerability - no slippage protection
all_findings.description: Swap at line 28 lacks slippage protection (sandwich attack vector)

evidence.recommendation: Add minAmountOut parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: MEV vulnerability - sandwich attack
all_findings.description: Swap at line 28 lacks slippage protection

evidence.recommendation: Add minAmountOut parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: Memory operation in assembly
all_findings.description: Memory operation at line 41 can corrupt Solidity memory

evidence.recommendation: Ensure memory operations don't overlap with Solidity

all_findings.title: Memory operation in assembly
all_findings.description: Memory operation at line 86 can corrupt Solidity memory

evidence.recommendation: Ensure memory operations don't overlap with Solidity

all_findings.title: Swap without slippage protection
all_findings.description: Swap at line 28 vulnerable to slippage manipulation

evidence.recommendation: Add amountOutMin parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: Memory operation in assembly
all_findings.description: Memory operation at line 92 can corrupt Solidity memory

evidence.recommendation: Ensure memory operations don't overlap with Solidity

all_findings.title: Potential Variable Shadowing
all_findings.description: Line 18: Variable 'memory' may shadow parent contract variable.

all_findings.title: Potential Variable Shadowing
all_findings.description: Line 79: Variable 'pointer' may shadow parent contract variable.

all_findings.title: Loop counter increment could be unchecked
all_findings.description: Loop counter at line 32 uses checked arithmetic unnecessarily

evidence.recommendation: Wrap loop counter increment in unchecked block (Solidity 0.8+)

all_findings.title: Function could potentially be view
all_findings.description: Function at line 14 might only read state

evidence.recommendation: Add view modifier if function only reads state

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of string messages
all_findings.description: Require at line 44 uses string error message (expensive)

evidence.recommendation: Define custom errors and use revert CustomError() (Solidity 0.8.4+)

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of string messages
all_findings.description: Require at line 69 uses string error message (expensive)

evidence.recommendation: Define custom errors and use revert CustomError() (Solidity 0.8.4+)

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of require strings
all_findings.description: Require with string at line 44 wastes deployment gas

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings
evidence.recommendation: Use custom error: error MyError(); revert MyError();

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of require strings
all_findings.description: Require with string at line 69 wastes deployment gas

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings
evidence.recommendation: Use custom error: error MyError(); revert MyError();
